website_summaries.verdict: While the handlebar rocker switch could be better (and certainly smaller), this is still a rugged winch at a great price.
pros: Strong, powerful winch at a low price
Easy installation, generally in less than an hour
cons: The handlebar control switch is very bulky and cumbersome
Some felt that the installation instructions were a little challenging

customer_reviews.title: Beats Harbor Freight
customer_reviews.text: My Harbor Fright 2500 winch lasted one day before it fell apart, only winching 700lbs. This little Champion has a higher rating, set right up using the BadLands remote setup and pulls like a train. You can see the difference in quality right out of the box, and it was not much more than the garbage one, plus it has a higher rating. Also now have a Champion generator, and that thing is awesome too, so far........
customer_reviews.author: GJF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winch for my 2004 Honda Foreman 450fe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this winch to install onto my 2004 Honda Foreman 450fe. I chose to purchase a separate mounting plate trhough Amazon thats made specifically for my Honda ATV instead of using the provided generic plate. The Winch and the Fairlead fit the plate perfectly and then I still had room to mount the whole assembly into place after turning the ATV wheels to the right. It was a tight fit but it went into the frame just fine. The winch works great, looks great, and was really easy to wire up. Would recommend to anyone looking for a quality winch.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Winch in/out control functions poorly
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Champion 3000lb winch kit and installed it on my Honda ATV to lift a Swisher dump bucket. The winch works fine but when I you press the winch in, or winch out buttons they usually fail to work. As a result, I have to keep re-pressing the buttons 5, or 6 times until it finally activates the the winch. Very frustrating. I'll try to contact Champion to see if they will replace the control box and wiring. Other than that it pulls strong and it holds loads without drifting. I just called Champion Customer Service and they agreed to send a new control box. I should get it next week.
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: The winch itself is a good unit. Pulls hard and is fairly quiet
customer_reviews.text: The winch itself is a good unit . Pulls hard and is fairly quiet. Fit the factory plate on a 2018 VLX 700 perfectly. The one drawback to the unit : The (quote) Handle bar controls. They have housed the forward / reverse relays and the direction controls in the same housing. Then they call the unit a handle bar control. It's huge, cumbersome and just down right ugly. Had I been aware of this before purchasing the winch I would have chosen a different winch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is slightly noisy but seems to work ok
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on my 2016 Honda Rancher four wheeler as a back up in case I needed it for emergency use. have not had a chance to use it yet for an actual test. just tested it buy pulling it to my truck. attached a video of it in use and the sound seems a little noisy is the reason for the 4 stars otherwise I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a few very minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty loud compared to the last winch on my 4 wheeler and I had to modify a nonstructural component to make it fit where the old which was because this one has a larger body. The button also requires a lot of force to hold in which might be a problem for cold gloved hands when plowing snow from my driveway. BUT it is high quality for the price and works very well
customer_reviews.author: Coby Blum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and very fast *** Updated***
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by this I may get a 12000 pound champion winch next ***Update*** lost one star.. I installed this in a dezee toolbox i modified to pull a riding mower and polaris utv up a ramp and into the bed. I've had no failures and it works fast but the controller really sucks. If you have a long pull you will be switching hands a lot because the buttons are ridiculously tough to push. I had to replace the controller with something else and took of one star. Should be a 3 star but the winch it self is really nice..
customer_reviews.author: Coreburner

customer_reviews.title: works great , good product
customer_reviews.text: please be aware that universal mounting plate does not fit Yamaha ATVs without mods. Other than that it is simple installation and seems to be working fine now , time will tell. I'm not big fan of controls but I understand why its so big so this is ok too. For the price it is great winch
customer_reviews.author: kerktam

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garage. We returned it after the first use. It's supposed to be able to lift 3000 pounds but it can't even lift 800.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Winch for ATV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch for my ATV to mainly run my snow plow. The installation was easy. Took less than 30 minutes to get it mounted in my 1998 Honda Foreman S. There is plenty of Power when using it with my snow plow. I decided to get this one over a harbor freight comparable due to the better reviews on this one. I am glad I did. It is about 20 dollars more than the 2500 lb Harbor Freight version, but it is well worth it. There is no need to find a place to hide the large solenoid and fuze that comes with the Harbor freight version.
customer_reviews.author: ACranne

customer_reviews.title: Motor/cable ok, but motor loud. Crappy switch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my UTV, mostly to use for raising a snow plow up-and-down. The main issues have been with the provided switch. First, the cables aren't long enough. Second, the switch is quite bulky, the buttons are rather hard to push and the contacts are very iffy which is very irritating when trying to raise/lower a plow on the move. Fully 50% of the time I have to push again, and harder, to get the switch to engage. Final issue: this is my first winch and I don't have much experience, but it makes a rather unpleasant and loud grinding noise in operation. Maybe they're all that way; if so, disregard my concern.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: winch cable brokeand up and down swich stinks
customer_reviews.text: on on first time i used it plowing snow cable broke and the switch has to be pressed very hard and your thumb starts to hurt after a while i would not recommend for plowing snow not because cable broke but the up and down switch is annoying as heck and is crappy i fixed cable we shall see on how long that takes to break again
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Solid built winch
customer_reviews.text: Compact and solidly built, this winch is a great value. I bought mine for my Pioneer 700-4 to use as a dock extractor from our lake in the fall. Easy to install, wire and operate. Components seem to be very well made. This product appears to be able to withstand the test of time. The only thing I wish this winch came with is the round rubber cable/hook saver that I had to purchase separately. Installation was a snap and was easy to wire. For my UTV, I needed a separate winch mount and this winch lined up perfectly with that. Happy, happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works great, you'll need 4 hours to install correctly
customer_reviews.text: If your mounting on a side x side you'll need to rewire handlebar switch to a dash toggle. The wireless remote works great. The long wired remote is huge and bulky...I did not install it. Be prepared to disassemble all plastics from center forward to route wires under floor, and take care to wrap cooling pipe from motor to radiator where wires may contact and melt. Winch is strong, and winds great in/out
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lot of winch for the money
customer_reviews.text: The winch was well packaged and protected. The included instructions were clear and concise. The universal mounting plate along with necessary hardware was also included. There was a robust control cable included, which some complained about being too large, but it needs to be because all the current of the motor is passing through the internal contactors. As the photos show, I’m using this to raise my snow blower, which is light duty for this 3,000 Lb. winch, but I will probably use it on my quad during non winter months. With a quality cable and safety hook, there’s really nothing to dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Old School

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for one-person operation
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace an identical item. When pulling, it is difficult for ONE person to control the winch, ATV, AND move the cable back-and-forth by hand. The original item broke, beyond repair, when the cable all wound-up in one place and sheared the bolts that hold the ends of the winch together. With two people, no problem. With one person you can break the winch. This really needs a fairlead that automatically goes back-and-forth as the cable is pulled in.
customer_reviews.author: HPRC R&D

customer_reviews.title: Worked a few times - then Drum BUSTED!!! - Customer Support HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked a few times, then it busted the drum. I'm pulling a 900 lb wave runner onto my trailer. I have another unit that has not had a problem (we'll see if it breaks soon). I'm VERY disappointed in the customer service. I have emailed them other questions and no response. I have called the 877-338-0999 number listed on their Tech Support and have been on hold over 75 minutes without any answer. I have done this on 2 occasions and NOBODY has answered or return emails. I'm hoping this may get someone's attention.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wires to short for UTV and no remote. Remote kit is 98$ more--
customer_reviews.text: had to mount the in/out switch up under my dash since wiring too short to put some place easy to reach. It does not come with a wired or wireless switch so the one in/out switch is all you get. works fine but is a pain. I decided to add the wireless remote which cost about 95$. If I had it it to do all over again. I would buy a winch with the accessories included.
customer_reviews.author: J.p. W.

customer_reviews.title: Get new hardware, other wise good set up. Plently of torque.
customer_reviews.text: Great winch, comes with just about everything you need. I suggest getting different / new hardware. The small bolt retainers strip out very easily and the larger bolt holes on my atv were stripped out. I suggest drilling new holes and getting higher grade hardware. I like the controller set up, mounted nicely on the handle bars and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to redesign a unit to do what YOU want and need.
customer_reviews.text: I had to extend the wires so it would work for me as I stood outside of truck cap. I used it as a come along to pull snow blower up ramp into truck for repairs. I spent some time figuring out the buttons were OK. They are just tough to use.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Only used once and a piece of junk. Had to take it off and throw away because I purchased a month before needed and didn’t know it was bad until too late to return. Very unhappy. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Rena B.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power and cable
customer_reviews.text: We have a one man lift that we have to put on a gym stages and remove it on a fairly regular basis. This required at least six strong men to pull and push it up some ramps that were on stairs. Dangerous situation if someone fell or lost their grip on a rope. After some welding a receiver onto the lift and quick connections for the electric. This is now a easy two person process. The 49 ft. of cable and 3,000 lbs of pulling power were just what we needed. This save a lot of expensive man power and is FAR safer. I figure that using this system just three times has paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: steven white

customer_reviews.title: Must do better
customer_reviews.text: No hardware included. You'll need m8 bolts x6. And probably a different winch plate will update Update winch cable snapped. Far from it's capacity. No kinks no fray Re-up: winch broke. The cross bolts snapped the housing, total junk
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: great little tool with a big heart
customer_reviews.text: bought this winch with an optional receiver mount to pull logs and limbs out of the creek i live on..naturally the first thing i did out of the box was to thoroughly abuse it. i wanted to see if it would stall or break first..i spooled off all 50 ft of cable .. wrapped it around a live tree put my truck in park and.set parking brake..an 08 ram 2500 4 wd with cummins6.7..with a leer camper cap..over 7000 lbs. winch slid my truck across the ground..a little slow but never stalled..very satisfied and does what i wanted with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Winch is fine.  Push button control, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The winch works as it should. I'm using it to raise and lower the snow plow blade on my ATV. The push buttons on the control are maddeningly difficult to activate, however. I have cut the wires to the control and connected them instead to a contactor which is actuated by an easy-to-push rocker switch. Problem solved. IMHO, the winch should be delivered with something similar.
customer_reviews.author: jim lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Good value, buttons are difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and seems well built for the money. The grip I have, along with a lot of other reviewers is the buttons. To raise and lower they have to pushed hard and exactly in the center. I don’t think they get any better after repeated use because I used it quite a bit this winter. If you find another brand rated this high and priced this low, you might want to consider it.
customer_reviews.author: RvW

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit on 2013 Suzuki King Quad 750
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said that this fit on a 2014 Suzuki King Quad, however, it does not fit on my 2013 King Quad. Unfortunately I wasn't able to try to install it until over a month after I purchased it and now Amazon will not let me return it. Is there any way that I can return this or exchange it for a different model that fits my ATV?
customer_reviews.author: HikeNH

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive for the size
customer_reviews.text: I have burned out two 2000lb winches on my ATV in the past 18 years. I decided to try a 3000lb winch. This works well but too new to test longevity. The controls are nice but you need to push the buttons just right to activate. Winch seems somewhat noisy but I really have nothing of this size to compare it too.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: The Controller Is ENORMOUS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install on my 2020 Tracker 570 (Artic Cat Alterra/Textron 570). Good instructions, plenty of cable. The handlebar mount controller is HUGE. The little bar clamp to mount to handlebar is a piece of junk. Bolts immediately stripped out. Winch is noisy when running, but it is what it is.......a $98 winch, that works.
customer_reviews.author: Gary McMurtrie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement winch for my sons 2012 Can-Am 400 XT ATV. For $100 bucks you can’t go wrong with this unit; it seems very well-made. I was able to use existing mounting bracket to mount it in there in the existing wiring. I replace the cable with a winch rope as I don’t like cabling. Have not used it yet but from what I can tell it’s great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sig VanDamme

customer_reviews.title: Good little Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I attach this to a homemade crane stand I made out of 1 1/2 inch galvanized pipe. This little winch will move a lot and has made it a lot easier to process big rounds of firewood. The only gripe I have about it,is the stupid switch controller that comes with it, complete garbage. It's well worth the $30 investment for a relay and a wireless remote setup.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended if you are on a budget. I purchased this unit and installed it on our UTV. I had to extend the power cables a few feet to accommodate. Otherwise this was a straight forward and simple install. Hardest part was drilling the holes. Some reviews mention they don't like the bulky button box- I like it. It feels well built as do the switches. I added the neoprene cover to protect the unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Kedzior

customer_reviews.title: Good Winch BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Good winch but the controller is HUGE. If mounting on an ATV keep this in mind. You'll have the thick cables coming straight to controller on handlebars. It takes up to much handlebar space imo. I returned it and bought one with a stand alone contactor and smaller switch for handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stettler

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Really easy straight forward install. Nice and easy wiring connection. 2 wires to winch and 2 wires to winch. They could be a little more liberal with the cables going to the battery. There was just enough to reach battery on my 2006 Honda Rancher 4x4. It is a little loud but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster Coggburn

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Dependable , easy to use, quality Very handy, easy to instal. Great quality for the price . I always trust champion brands. Not disappointed. Can't beat it at this price with a 2 year warranty! Bottom Line: Yes, I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: buffy augustine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winch for a Barbie Jeep
customer_reviews.text: I've watched my husband try to de-root stumps and winch s*** out of our riding trails with absolute disappointment. This winch is perfect for a cutsie attachment for your kids barbie cars/jeep. Still have yet to be proved wrong. Will update review when I am.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O

customer_reviews.title: using this on a mini buldozer (magnatrac) fro skidding logs ...
customer_reviews.text: using this on a mini buldozer (magnatrac) fro skidding logs, dislodging tangled trees, etc. with a snatch block for the heavier jobs, haven't come across a task I couldn't handle yet.
customer_reviews.author: aknrs

customer_reviews.title: Switch is hard to mount and is not sensitive adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Works and lifts in out button huge trued to use it on my Polaris ranger for snow plowing hard to find a way to mount switch to make it work good kind of awkward and the switch is not as sensitive as I like from micro adjusting up-and-down so I had to replaced it with one more sensitive but it works great on my trailer
customer_reviews.author: Dannyboy5114

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Winch!
customer_reviews.text: This winch is awesome! I mounted mine to a receiver hitch insert with quick attach battery plugs, so that I can use it on my truck, four-wheeler, side-by-side, or whatever I feel the need to pull around. I would highly recommend this winch.
customer_reviews.author: M.Kempf 5701

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great deal. 3000# and pulls like a champion. Electrical was not long enough for my Honda pioneer 700-4. Added a 100amp fuse and some additional wire. Controller is not the nicest, but it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: scott myers

customer_reviews.title: Burnt up motor on the third use
customer_reviews.text: After the third time using, smoked the motor. Before that I'd of given it a three only because the cable jams in itself after the first use making it difficult to unwind. I'd love to return it, even though it was used 3 times its outside the return period.
customer_reviews.author: CAndrews

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Winch works as advertised. Hydraulics on my plow truck failed using winch to raise and lower it does the job no sweat . Only drawback about the winch is the controller big ole button control takes a lot of pressure to get the buttons to work used it twice that was enough of that ordered solenoid relay and rocker switch setup works great .reduce wiring cable length by half ..
customer_reviews.author: FOAD

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap
customer_reviews.text: Unit came in, first bolt stripped out. New winch came in the next day, would not retract. Only turn out, not pull in. Returning my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great Winch for Honda Rancher
customer_reviews.text: Great product. easy to install. came with plate but rancher needs special plate. wiring cables worked but ideally could be 4 inches longer. Suggest the instruction provide comment on wiring direct to battery without fuse. Lots of discussion on-line. Great product for the cost. Works well! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spillane

customer_reviews.title: Got me out of a bad situation!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about this winch isnhownhard itnis to press and hold the buttons. I have a Polaris 450 and 570 with these work horses installed on. And its fortunate I had them installed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful winch
customer_reviews.text: Really like the winch. Plenty of power and nice and compact. Easy to install but you likely will need a mounting plate for your particular ATV. Used it the first week to pull my 1700 lb subcompact tractor out of the mud.
customer_reviews.author: G. Claybrook

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install. Can't say I'm thrilled with the "in/out" buttons but with care they work fine. I replaced a 1500# winch with this 3000# winch. Works so much better lifting my boat lift up and down. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sales

customer_reviews.title: Nice winch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a winch on my 4wheeler that I use for a snowplow. Overall it is great product at a great price. It is more powerful, smoother and quiet than the winch I replaced. I also really like the clutch control, very easy to grip. The hardware that came with it worked well and installed easily. Only knock I have was the size of the remote, just seems a little oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Winch
customer_reviews.text: Used the winch to pull trusses. Only thing I didn't like was that the buttons was hard to push and I had to keep pressure on the switch. It'll do what's needed.
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: Great winch from champion
customer_reviews.text: This winch is probably the best bang for the buck, at least for atv. Its everything you need in most application. For my application i needed a diferent mounting bracket (34 bucks).
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: The winch itself is good. the rocker switch control is terrible installed it ...
customer_reviews.text: The winch itself is good. the rocker switch control is terrible installed it in a UTV had to buy a new power lines to go to the battery and I just eliminated that switch and put a solenoid and instead but for the money it's a good winch needs a little bit more accessories with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The little winch that could
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go on my car hauler to move some cars I had to get to another area ,winch pulled 3 cars and one truck up on to the trailer with no issues ,well worth the money I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Tronarat

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I dragged a medium sized car (with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I dragged a medium sized car (with no wheels on it), across a steel plate. That was about it's limit for power. Better than I expected. Not as noisy as I saw in a video. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my project wheeler and yard chores.
customer_reviews.text: The control box is a little bulky, they should put a disconnect with additional wire so you could run off of wheeler if needed.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: IT'S WORTH THE MONEY----BUT COULD BE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: THE CONTROL WIRES ARE SHORT AND THAT'S AN ISSUE IN MY CASE. TENSION ON THE LINE PUTS ME IN THE PATH OF A FAILED PULL. NEED MORE LINE TO AVOID A HOOK IN YOUR FACE ON A SHORT PULL. IF YOU'VE EVER USED POWER WENCHES YOU'LE KNOW WHAT CAN HAPPEN AND WILL HAPPEN SOMETIMES.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY P.

customer_reviews.title: works good time will tell
customer_reviews.text: so far so good winched polaris 6x6 big boss up in air over big tree limb good pull power great so far
customer_reviews.author: Wolf. Peltonen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very very good quality and easy to install and wire up I hooked it up to my rancher on front end and now there’s no such thing as getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy an adapter plate for my Polaris ETX, but then it fit perfectly. Had to do some planning to make sure the wires reached. Came out great !!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I welded up a bracket for my small car trailer, and mounted this winch to it. It fit the bill. It had the pulling capacity larger than the weight of the car, was inexpensive, and came with the rollers. I went to use it and it worked as intended. I plan to permanently mount a battery and wire it to the 7 pin connector so that it will charge the winch battery when towing. It is a little louder than I expected, but it did the job beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Eells

customer_reviews.title: Winch that does the job
customer_reviews.text: I researched lots of winch’s for my ATV and finally decided on this one. Installation was easy and works the plow and anything else I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Family life

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Easy install, perfectly snug fit on my 2017 Polaris ACE 900XC. Required a little trim in the factory mount location to get it in, but it bolted up in less than an hour total install time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Express

customer_reviews.title: This is a simple power winch that I use on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple power winch that I use on an ATV, everything from pulling small logs to raising and lowering a snow blade to hanging game. It serves its purpose well although it will probably never be used at its maximum weight. It has proven to be well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall L.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and run wires on my utv! Awesome price but so far have not use this in real condition when I'm stuck in mud or belly hug!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: The winch gets stuck. When pulling it back in ( with button) it lll randomly stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Martinez

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE:  BROKE FIRST 10 MINUTES...CHEAP MADE IN CHINA JUNK...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: BROKE FIRST 10 MINUTES...CHEAP MADE IN CHINA JUNK... WAS ONLY PULLING 500 LBS. ON FLAT GROUND...
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert S. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Junk gears rounded off after one use
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money spend the extra money to buy a better winch I used this once and the gears striped out they don’t make very much contact and the edge of the gear round off
customer_reviews.author: matthew gardebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Good Winch for the price and plowing snow
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the winch looks and feels like its very good quality for the price, I bought it to use it with a plow, lifts the plow right up pretty fast too, controller feels good and mounts right on the handlebars and can be slid off the mount to use it as a recovery remote. Might buy one to put on my new UTV also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Champion winch 3000 LB
customer_reviews.text: has enough pulling power for my needs ..... so far so good
customer_reviews.author: rina garza

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Complete setup hook to a battery and go to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: used to pull logs from under a dock worked great
customer_reviews.author: Karl J. Groom

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been one rugged winch, have used a LOT!!!!! comes in very handy on my moose plow on atv, WOW very impressed with this, hooked up very easy too!! would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: slick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ATV winch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the winch and it was an easy install. Perfect fit for my yamaha grizzly 450.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Test before u install
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back for replacement winch would not work replace winch worked as promised no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for easy to use because of the remote.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Warn winch on my Polaris Crew, I don’t think it’s any louder than the Warn it replaced. I have it connected to a rocker switch in the cab & works well. The remote is junk as it gets fire hot when operating the winch with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice winch and very easy to install with detailed instructions and pre drilled mounting holes.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Leads on end cap would not clear bumper tube in vertical orientation. Manual indicates cap can be rotated 90 degrees to avoid this problem but doesn't say how. Customer Service guy explained in a couple of minutes. Easy fix and install was a breeze from there. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke easy
customer_reviews.text: Used one time on my rhino 660 and it broke
customer_reviews.author: willie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great wench
customer_reviews.text: Good product had to order different mounting plate but still glad I bought the wench works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Solid brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid brand. Works very well and is strong. Wont go wrong getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Powerful winch for a great price. Galvanized cable is easy replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Christiansch

customer_reviews.title: ATV Winch
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that the supplied switch had connections that were too short and the control buttons work when they want.
customer_reviews.author: eric goodman

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, every thing mounted up from my old warn winch mount plate. Sure glad I went with Champion. Love the switch with built in on off button on the syl,. which was purchased for snow plow. I did not use the switch that came with it because of no syl.
customer_reviews.author: dennis may

customer_reviews.title: Control box works when it wants.
customer_reviews.text: Good pulling winch but after 4 uses the control buttons work intermittently. You really have to mash the cable out button to get it to work ...if it will work ...when it wants to work. Not happy with this purchase at all because of the frustrating controls.
customer_reviews.author: C. Caserta

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. I'm using it as a "crane" ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I'm using it as a "crane" in my garage to lift heavy objects. Can't comment on how it might work pulling a vehicle, but for my use I have no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: Works good and easy to install on my ATV. The only problem was that the control mount is set up only for sit-on ATVs only (not side by sides) so had to improvise but still made a clean installation.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Works well easy set up. other than being slow ( which I find okay when unloading my car trailer) and pretty noisy... happy so far..
customer_reviews.author: 06C6VETTE

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy mount work very well right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: james laws

customer_reviews.title: Pulled a non running 4300 lb car onto my utility ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a non running 4300 lb car onto my utility trailer with ease. Very impressed. So much so I ordered the bigger 4700 for my other trailer.
customer_reviews.author: EdmondOgletree

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on first day out! Had enough power to pull high centered side by side 12 out of ditch.
customer_reviews.author: BATES

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I bolted this to the bed of my van to load my dirt bike. Works perfect, had to add a wireless remote because the cord isn't long enough for my unusual application.
customer_reviews.author: LeeDog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great... exactly like the KFI brand I replaced..just a different colour and half the price !
customer_reviews.author: lgo

customer_reviews.title: Enough power for me.
customer_reviews.text: Pulls what I want. I use it to pull my large boat into the back yard and garage. Enough power for me.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH  MANN

customer_reviews.title: Does what I ask of it.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well once a separate mount plate was purchased for my 2000 Honda ATV. Used in conjunction with a blade for snow removal, and performed admirably this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Shane D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works like charm! Already assisted several people with their cars!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, mounted on my 2018 Kawasaki Teryx4 and it fit perfect, easy to install and works well
customer_reviews.author: phillip waalkens

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: love the quality and the ease of installing , plus the controls for in and out, i will be buying my son one too.

customer_reviews.title: Great winch not so great controls
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on a Yamaha kodiak 700 works great. Easy to instal. But the controls could be better hard to engage and don’t fit handle bars properly.

customer_reviews.title: good winch
customer_reviews.text: like everything but the controls, hard to push hoping after a plowing season they'll break in

product_meta.title: Champion 3000-lb. ATV/UTV Winch Kit
product_meta.description: The Champion Power Equipment 13004 3000-lb. ATV/UTV Winch Kit includes everything you need to start winching, including a mounting channel, a roller fairlead and a remote control. With a rated line pull of 3000 pounds, mount this winch on your ATV or side by side with the mounting channel to quickly harness the strength of its 1.3-horsepower (12-volt) DC permanent magnet motor. The 46-foot by 3/16-inch galvanized, super-duty aircraft cable is less prone to fraying, even when used in highly abrasive terrain, such as in rocks, mud, or sand. This incredibly strong cable is guided onto the 1.5 by 3.2-inch drum through the reliable roller fairlead to maximize the life of the cable. The three-stage planetary gear system along with the free-spooling clutch and handlebar-mounted remote control offer excellent control while winching. Designed with your safety in mind, this winch features dynamic braking of the winch drum so you’ll have the stopping power you need for each job. With a gear reduction ratio of 171:1, the winch boasts a line speed of 4.3 feet per minute with a full load, and 8.9 feet per minute with no load. Accompanied by the heavy-duty clevis hook and handy strap, this compact and lightweight tool is anything but lightweight when it comes to power. Offering much more than a motor and a spool of rope, the Champion 3000-lb. Winch Kit is a necessary tool for any situation you might encounter. Champion Support and our nationwide network of service centers will back up your purchase with a 2-year limited warranty and FREE lifetime technical support.
feature_bullets: Powerful – 3000 lb. max rated line pull and 1 HP permanent magnet motor
Bonus Accessories – Roller fairlead, mounting channel, handle bar mounted remote control
49 ft. super duty aircraft cable with rugged, latched clevis hook
Efficient planetary gear and dynamic braking systems
Champion Support - 2 year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support
